entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
